notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: JM and JY proposed the experimental design. JY, CY, HS, ZT, QX, WW, and CC executed the experiments. JY, CY, SY, LB, and XT helped with data interpretation and analysis. JM, JY, and CY composed the manuscript. The final manuscript was reviewed and approved by all authors before submission. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
